duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing quantitative decision support for capital investments, including projects and new energy storage investments.
Analyzing existing portfolio investments to optimize return on capital.
Leading all major aspects concerning the financial models related to the development of utility storage assets in neglected regions.
Working cross-functionally with relevant teams on all potential analytic operations.
Maintaining the timely progression of critical deliverables.
Being a part of a growing entrepreneurial organization.

education_certification.credential: Degree in finance, business or accounting. Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred).
